trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There was one other sighting in Denver on or around July 4th 2008
Summary: Afternoon star in the blue sky.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was headed out at lunchtime to pick up fireworks. i looked at the sky which was clear with slight whispy clouds.a object that is best described as a moving star caught my eye. it appeared very high in the apmosphere and moved in short dashes with stops and minor turns .two other people viewed the object with me untill it was to far away to see. we thought it might be some sort survelience craft since the democratic convention was coming. or mabye not of this world.about 5 minutes after the sighting fighter planes raced overhead with a loud roar.whether this was for the fourth of july i will never know.and havent seen anything like it since
